episodes.description: In this episode, we'll be digging deeper into the samurai legacies that have been preserved throughout Japan. You might be able to touch a hidden aspect of the samurai culture like swordsmith.
episodes.subtitle: Samurai Legacy
episodes.title: Dig More Japan

episodes.description: From inns and hotels to coffee shops and subways, Japanese society is filled with the spirit of hospitality, called Omotenashi. It's all about making sure that people can live in peace and security.
episodes.subtitle: Country of Omotenashi
episodes.title: Dig More Japan

episodes.description: Japanese winter has given rise to some unique customs and recreational activities. In this episode, we'll dive into some of Japan's incredible winter wonderland.
episodes.subtitle: Japanese Winter Wonderland
episodes.title: Dig More Japan

episodes.description: The way Japanese live changes with the times, and so to do the things we use. In this new episode, we will deep look into the world of items used for daily life in Japan.
episodes.subtitle: Everyday Tradition
episodes.title: Dig More Japan

episodes.description: Japan has come up with all kinds of ways to avert disaster. Today we look at the spiritual side of the equation with various ways to ward off evil. And we pray for the health of people of the world.
episodes.subtitle: Warding Off Evil
episodes.title: Dig More Japan

episodes.description: It's been a year since the beginning of the coronavirus pandemic and efforts continue to alleviate the crisis. Join us on our new episode for a look into how Japan is responding to the challenge.
episodes.subtitle: Pandemic Solutions
episodes.title: Dig More Japan

episodes.description: In Japan, people and animals live and work together in all kinds of ways. Join us in this new episode, as we dig deep to uncover some surprising examples of how the Japanese interact with animals.
episodes.subtitle: Japanimals
episodes.title: Dig More Japan

episodes.description: Mild weather and a carpet of cherry blossoms make spring a special season for the people of Japan. In this episode, we will dig deep and greet the coming spring with highlights from NHK World Japan.
episodes.subtitle: Spring Awakens
episodes.title: Dig More Japan

episodes.content: Tokyo is an internationally recognizable mega-city. 14 million people call the densely packed city of Tokyo home. But behind all the bright lights there is another city that's not so familiar. Please join this episode as we explore the unknown side of Tokyo.
episodes.description: This is a program that introduces NHK WORLD's many attractive programs in fun short videos. The clips will also be introduced on social media to meet the needs of people who are interested in Japan.
episodes.subtitle: Unknown Tokyo
episodes.title: Dig More Japan

episodes.content: From capsule toys to bonsai, in Japan miniaturization is no small matter. Even fishing rods could be minimized for tiny fish. In this episode, we will focus on the Japanese passion for all things miniscule, micro and mini.
episodes.description: From capsule toys to Bonsai, in Japan miniaturization is no small matter. Even fishing rods could be minimized. We will focus on the Japanese passion for all things miniscule, micro and mini.
episodes.subtitle: Japan in Miniature
episodes.title: Dig More Japan
